author: Red Means Recording
description:
Get the album, including the M8 bundles: https://soundvision.bandcamp.com/album/superstructures
My previous M8 albums (with bundles):
https://soundvision.bandcamp.com/album/heartsing
https://soundvision.bandcamp.com/album/rituals

Electronic music (mostly drum & bass) written on a trip to NYC with M8 tracker. All tracks except You were started in NYC, where the initial ideas were formed and nurtured while exploring the city. The final stages of polish came in the week that followed back home.

Stems from the M8 tracker were then exported and final mixing + polish was done in Ableton.

Mastered with Ozone 12.

The download of this album on Bandcamp comes with the completely bundles for this album for the M8 tracker, which means you can load these songs in their 99% finished state and explore them on your own, if you want.

Much of the bass sound design was done leading up to NYC, which became this pack on Gumroad here: redmeansrecording.gumroad.com/l/pjrcj

Huge thanks to everyone who
title: Jeremy Blake - Superstructures (Full Album Visualizer) - DnB / Electronica
